mapper.insert: insert into follow(following, following_user_no, user_no) values(#{following}, #{followingUserNo}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: select f.following, f.following_user_no, f.add_day, u.user_profile, u.user_intro from follow f join users u on f.user_no=u.user_no where f.user_no=#{userNo}
select count(distinct p.project_no) as count from project p join follow f on f. following_user_no=p.user_no where f.following_user_no=#{followingUserNo}
select user_name, user_profile, user_intro from users where user_no in ( select user_no from follow where following_user_no=#{followingUserNo} )
